website_summaries.verdict: This unit has a large field of pleasing light and is one of the more adjustable units available.
pros: Very adjustable, huge field of pleasing light, built like a tank — and that means it will last for a long time
cons: Expensive and large — not very portable

customer_reviews.title: What can I say? It works. Used as ...
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It works. Used as instructed. I noticed within a week. More energy, brighter mood...but you have to keep using it or the effect stops.
customer_reviews.author: SeveralLots

customer_reviews.title: This model is the best because it can be used either with or without ...
customer_reviews.text: This model is the best because it can be used either with or without he stand at the same cost as the one without the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Harrigan

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using it for a couple weeks. I think it's helping, but it's hard to be sure without a longer sample. This, however, is a product review and not a discussion of effective technique. This thing is built like a tank. It's solid steel, bent and riveted. I don't have a calibrated light meter, but it sure looks bright enough to be 10,000 lux at 17". I expect it to last for years, just on how well-made it is. It's hard to get a sense of how big it is from the picture, so, for reference, the screen is a 19" diagonal and the footprint is 11" x 18".
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hickmott

customer_reviews.title: Light is great, mechanicals have an issue.
customer_reviews.text: Lighting is fine but the knobs to hold the light in a fix rotational position lose torque. The light box starts to rotate away from your desired setting. If u have one, try a thin lock washer.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: not bright, flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The light was only medium bright. The standing legs were flimsy, unable to be fully tightened to prevent movement of the light box. I returned it. (I bought a light box from Alaska Northern Lights instead, which was worth the extra money.)
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca G

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: A true lifesaver for people suffering from Seasonal Affective Disorder. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Results
customer_reviews.text: I have SAD ( seasonal affective disorder) and have had it all my life. This light has changed my winters here in New England. 30minutes to 1 hour a day sitting on a desk is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: rhonda

customer_reviews.title: I am excited to wake up everyday
customer_reviews.text: This product works for me. I had 3 miserable winters in Michigan and this winter I am determined to cheer up.
customer_reviews.author: liuyin18

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered!
customer_reviews.text: Has three tilt adjustments which makes it easy to adapt to whatever table/desk I'm at. Light intensity is just right. And, was totally easy to set up right out of the box. This is the best light box I've used in over 20 years of light box use. Will recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: a book lover

customer_reviews.title: Academics secret weapon
customer_reviews.text: This light is effective at invigorating my studies. I use it at about 24-27 inches and I study longer and more clearly than without. This is not a placebo effect. These lights are known to trigger the release of hormones that I clearly feel. I was skeptical at first, and especially without many other reviews. For a few days I felt no effects, and then BOOM. This is the academics secret heavy hitting artillery.
customer_reviews.author: Penname

customer_reviews.title: S.A.D. treatment in northern latitudes
customer_reviews.text: I bought the light box after several years living with long dark winters, cause of "season affective disorder" depression. Since retiring to a northern latitude in 2006 I found myself increasingly more reclusive in winter, not motivated to be active as usual. My doctor and I discussed the benefits of a light box, and researching various models I found this one to get best reviews. I look forward to seeing how effective this will be in the coming winter months. So far I'm impressed with the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Nelson

customer_reviews.title: I like what I see thus far
customer_reviews.text: To early for a review. I like what I see thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi S.

customer_reviews.title: Can't really tell if there is a change
customer_reviews.text: It's been over a week now and I don't feel much different. It's a nice wakeup to the morning (bright light) but mood hasn't changed much. Wouldn't hate on the product. Probably just me.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn N. McNeil

customer_reviews.title: It's bright and feels like a sunny day
customer_reviews.text: I try to sit in front of it in the morning, but I am not a morning person. But it is a great glow on a gloomy grey day, which seems to be every day this past 6 months . . . the stand is not "sturdy," but I am not moving it all around either. I am happy!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Works!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing actually works! It not only kept me in a good mood throughout the winter but it also helped with my sleep habits and made it easier to fall asleep and wake up on time. I just turn it on for 15-20 minutes in the morning while I'm checking my email.
customer_reviews.author: MissC

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Helps!
customer_reviews.text: The light therapy in conjunction with a Vitamin D3 supplement has definitely helped with my winter blues. The product is easy to put together and is also adjustable. The only issue I have with it is that it is fairly large and somewhat awkward. I use it while getting ready for work, and it takes up a large amount of space on the vanity. Overall, though, I think this is a great product and would recommend it to others with Seasonal Affective Disorder.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Not too big for a desk top. Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. She loves it and uses it while she works at her desk (set up on the side). It's not too big for a desk. The unit seems very sturdy and well made. It setup in less than a minute; the only assembly is attaching the two sets of legs on each side with two knobs/bolts. No tools required.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Bear

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This light changed my life. After only twenty minutes of use I fell asleep that night and woke up rested and refreshed. Until then I haven't slept well in years. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bright light! For S.A.D. and putting on makeup.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a week now and I love it. I work night shift so I use it when I get up in the late afternoon. To get the 20-30 minutes that is need for the effects I sit in front of it and put my makeup on. Its great lighting for that purpose too.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Dillingham

customer_reviews.title: Nice white light
customer_reviews.text: Nice White Light (unlike more blue light which I do not like)
customer_reviews.author: pleasantlyattractive

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for SAD
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light for my husband because he has suffered from SAD syndrome for most of his life. He uses it for 30 minutes every day at breakfast. He has not been depressed this year as he has been during the winter months in other years. We live in the northern part of the US and sometimes in the winter it is overcast for days. If you or your loved one suffers from SAD, do them a favor and buy this light for them.
customer_reviews.author: snow bunny

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: There wasn't enough initial information on this product and I erred in thinking once I received the product, it would explain more. Instead, I received the product with absolutely no instructions whatsoever. Questions like: How long should I use it each day? When was the best time to use it? How far away from my eyes should it be? Because it is two bars of light, is looking into one bar enough or is it only 5,000 lux. If I were to do it again, I'd get the desk model. This is too large and too bulky. It's also very expensive so make sure you have exactly what you want because you aren't going to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Creative1

customer_reviews.title: NOT 10,000 lux, it is 5,500 lux
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the low wattage bulbs that they claim output 10,000 lux at 17", so I measured the output of the fixture and this is in fact FALSE ADVERTISING. It only outputs around 1/2 of that -- about 5,500 lux at 17" or 10,000 lux at about 9". Not recommended if you don't like buying hype/false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Move over Effexor!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product by the recommendatio of my doctor. I was very sceptical - but after only a few days of use (just 20 minutes in the morning!) I noticed a HUGE difference; these lights really do work! I was able to reduce my medication and my mood was better than it has been in years. I also notice a difference if I do not use it for a few days. I actually was able to reduce my medication! The light takes up more room on my makeup table than I would like but it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The product is very light weight and easy to use. I bought it in August 2007 for use in Colorado as the days got shorter. The impact was very noticeable within a week. The light-starved holiday season was a pleasure for the first time in a decade. The impact was the result of using it 10-15 mins each morning whiled I surfed the web and read the news.
customer_reviews.author: L

product_meta.title: Northern Light Technologies Boxelite-OS 10,000 Lux Bright Light Therapy Light Box, Black
product_meta.description: The Boxelite is an affordable light box that emits diffuse light through the large front panel measuring 12 inches x 15 inches. The panel's angle can be easily adjusted and offers 5 elevation settings making it extremely versatile and pleasant to use while reading, eating etc. This highly efficient unit draws only 85 watts, yet delivers 10,000 lux at a comfortable, class-leading distance of up to 14 inches. The Boxelite is ideal for bright light therapy but may also be used at the office or for any task that requires bright lighting. 7 year unlimited warranty
feature_bullets: Offers 10,000 lux of diffuse light at a distance of up to 14 inches, UV blocked
Full Spectrum Lighting. Quality metal construction
Adjustable panel angle and 5 elevation settings allow for a truly customizable light therapy experience
Electronically powered ballast assures reliable performance with no flicker and no hum
Made in Canada following strict QAI safety guidelines
